about_the_game:
The latest in the “Red Spider” series of Hong Kong noir visual novel with full japanese voice acting, “Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite” is now available with all-new graphics.

The hard-boiled story of two female protagonists is set in Thailand in 2009.

This title can be enjoyed on its own, although you will get more out of it if you have already played the previous titles in the series available on Steam.

2009. Ben, an officer of the Red Flower Society, an underworld mob that operated in Kowloon, Hong Kong is found murdered in Thailand.

Yeung Kwun, the head of the Red Flower Society, asks Yvet, who used to belong to the assassination organization “the web”, to investigate the case.

In Thailand, Romrowan, the head of Newmoon, a Thai crime syndicate, is wanted for Ben's murder.

Yvet, an old acquaintance of Ramrowan, stands up to exonerate him.

2009. Miok, an agent with North Korea's Ministry of State Security, is tracking a North Korean defector in Thailand.

She discovers that her target is being transported by a Hong Kong broker and follows him, only to have him murdered before her eyes.

Myok and her former subordinate, Yui, who has now defected and is working in Thailand's entertainment district as Kathooey, track down the broker's cell phone.

Music:Yasunori Shiono(Lufia series) Yukio Nakajima(Puzzle & Dragons)

Play time: 2-3 hours

content_descriptors.notes: It includes scenes of torture by government organizations and killing by criminal organizations.
